FORCE
Usage: force <victim | all> <command> <arguments>
FORCE forces a character, either monster or player, to perform a certain action. FORCE ALL forces everyone in the game; FORCE ROOM forces everyone in your room.
Example:
> force fido drop meat > force all save > force room look fido
If you are invisible to the one being forced, the force will be performed silently.
